articles.author: Brian Davids
articles.title: ‘Loki’ Head Writer Eric Martin Talks Episode Four’s Explosive Ending: “There’s Meaning in All of It” - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: With two episodes left, Martin promises the path to the finale "is not going to be the straight line that we expect."
articles.content:
[This story contains spoilers for Loki season two, episode four, “Heart of the TVA.”]
If Ke Huy Quan’s Ouroboros is the glue that holds the TVA together, then Loki season two head writer Eric Martin… [+15360 chars]
